text: "All the Way from Memphis" is a 1973 song by Mott the Hoople. It was taken from their sixth studio album Mott. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom and did not chart at all in the United States. It was covered by Brian May in 1998. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Mott the Hoople songs
title: All the Way from Memphis
